plot: 'Suraj Ka Saatvan Ghoda' is an experimental novella from the legendary hindi author Dharmveer Bharti. First published in 1952, this novella has earned unprecedented fame in terms of sensitivity and structure over the years. Through the various stories narrated by Manik Mulla - one of the central characters - a group of youngsters discover the essence of life. Dr. Bharati has subtly weaved the spirit of life in the various story pieces.
